analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Parittaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe ekādasa …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: parittam hetum dhammam paṭicca na mahaggataḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe ekādasa pe avigate terasa

original: Parittaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cuddasa, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate cuddasa.
analyzed: parittam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na parittaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cuddasa ārammaṇe cuddasa adhipatiyā nava pe avigate cuddasa
